     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">

      </span>
     </h1>

     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17309236">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309236">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309236">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309236">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17309236" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17309237">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309237">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309237">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309237">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the&nbsp;
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17309237" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17309238">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309238">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309238">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309238">
          <div id="boxatt17309238" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24168590">
              <a id="link_24168590" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24168590,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24168598">
              <a id="link_24168598" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://muhlenberg.eblib.com/patron/FullRecord.aspx?p=491475" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24168598,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24168598}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Jewish American Popular Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This unique encyclopedia chronicles American Jewish popular culture, past and present in music, art, food, religion, literature, and more. Over 150 entries, written by scholars in the field, highlight topics ranging from animation and comics to Hollywood and pop psychology. Without the profound contributions of American Jews, the popular culture we know today would not exist. Where would music be without the music of Bob Dylan and Barbra Streisand, humor without Judd Apatow and Jerry Seinfeld, film without Steven Spielberg, literature without Phillip Roth, Broadway without Rodgers and Hammerstein.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382800">
              Encyclopedia Judaica (2nd ed., 2007)
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library Reference Collection 296.03 E56j)
               <br />
               Signed entries by invited contributors. Good for topic-finding and topic-narrowing.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17309239">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309239">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309239">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books (secondary and primary resources published in books)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309239">
          <div id="boxatt17309239" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20382856">
              <a id="link_20382856" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382856,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in our library and libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.  Use in conjunction with interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382861">
              <a id="link_20382861" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382861,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May include excerpts of full text, especially of books now in the public domain (published pre-1923).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17309241">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309241">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309241">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles (mostly secondary material, with some references to primary documents)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309241">
          <div id="boxatt17309241" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20382804">
              <a id="link_20382804" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382804,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382806">
              <a id="link_20382806" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382806,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for American history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24168615">
              <a id="link_24168615" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24168615,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382807">
              <a id="link_20382807" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382807,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for European history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382808">
              <a id="link_20382808" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=jph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382808,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767659}); ">
               Index to Jewish Periodicals
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for scholarship on Jewish religion and culture. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382805">
              <a id="link_20382805" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382805,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382809">
              <a id="link_20382809" href="http://jnul.huji.ac.il/rambi/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382809,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Jewish Life and Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20382809}); ">
               RambiWeb
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free index of scholarship on Jewish religion and culture.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4698808" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17309243">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309243">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309243">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309243">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Trexler Library's Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17309243" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17309244">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17309244">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17309244">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17309244">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17309244" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
